snippet.title: Nancy Drew: Tomb of the Lost Queen Official Trailer | Nancy Drew Mystery Games
snippet.description:
Watch the official trailer for the Nancy Drew adventure game, Tomb of the Lost Queen. Order the game @ https://www.herinteractive.com/shop-games/nancy-drew-tomb-of-the-lost-queen/

Egyptologists and archaeologists are abuzz about recent discoveries by a university dig team, but suspicious accidents left the group isolated and leaderless. Is a curse burying their progress or is someone sabotaging their success? Find out in this mystery adventure game, Nancy Drew: Tomb of the Lost Queen, and play on to uncover the lost secrets buried within the tomb!

visit us: http://www.herinteractive.com
follow us: http://www.twitter.com/herinteractive
like us: http://www.facebook.com/nancydrewpcgames
subscribe to us: http://www.youtube.com/herinteractivegames
